metadata.Title: CVE-2020-10773 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A stack information leak flaw was found in s390/s390x in the Linux kernelâ€™s memory manager functionality, where it incorrectly writes to the /proc/sys/vm/cmm_timeout file. This flaw allows a local user to see the kernel data.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
